description: Sage ACT! is a customer relationship management ( CRM ) program for Windows. It allows businesses to manage, track, and communicate with their customers.

The program includes its own word processor, which allows users to create text documents. In version 3 of ACT!, the program began saving these documents as WPA files. Previously, ACT! saved these documents as .WPD files.
NOTE: Swiftpage acquired ACT! in 2013. The program is now known as Act!.
